title: Announcement, From Artists' Studios/Current Work: Robert Bielat, Lincoln Eddy, 1989
title_raw: From Artists' Studios/Current Work: Robert Bielat, Lincoln Eddy
signed: Signature imprinted in blue, center, sideways: design: mr. ed ward fella, a typeof type-/ writer
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in blue across upper half: DETROIT FOCUS GALLERY/ 743 BEAUBIEN, 3RD FLOOR, DETROIT MI48226(313)962-9025/ HOURS: WEDNESDAY-SAT., 12-6PM/ FROM ARTISTS STUDIOS//CURRENT WORK/ FROM JUNE 30 1989-JULY 28 1989/ CLOSED: JULY 1 TO 4/ RECEPTION FOR THE ARTISTS: JULY 7/ FRIDAY, 5:30-8:30PM/ 7:30PM ARTS FOUNDATION OF MICHIGANAWARDSPRESENT/ ROBERT BIELAT/ LINCOLN EDDY; lower left edge, running downward, sideways: artist honorariums provided by the arts found-/ ation of michigan; up lower half, left of center, sideways: curators: richard axsom, professor of art history/ university of m ichigan, dearborn/ sheree rensel, artist, exhibition coordinator,/ paintcreek center for the arts

Verso: Imprinted in blue, lower left quadrant: Detroit/ FOCUS/ GALLERY/ 743 BEAUBIEN 3RD FLOOR/ DETROIT,/ MICHIGAN4 8226/ ACROSS FROM THE PEOPLE-/ MOVER STATION; from lower left quadrant to center, sideways: with the support of the/ national endowment for the arts/ michigan council for the arts/ detroit council for the arts/ arts foundation of michigan; in lower right quadrant: NONPROFIT ORG./ BULK RATE/ U S POSTAGE/ PAID/ DETROIT, MICHIGAN/ PERMIT NO2960
description:
Poster announcement printed in dark blue ink for exhibition at the Detroit Focus Gallery, designed to be mailed.    
Recto: Upper left quadrant, image of small mask with ribbon-like lines extending from either side across quadrant.  Upper half, text, various sizes, styles, giving location contact information, event name, dates, times, and additional information.  Lower left edge, sideways, two columns of text, various sizes, styles, with exhibition information.  
Verso: Across lower half, text, various sizes, styles, giving mailing information.  From lower left quadrant to center, sideways, column of text, various sizes, styles with sponsor and mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, From Artists' Studios/Current Work: Robert Bielat, Lincoln Eddy, 1989. Offset lithograph on cream paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-53
